original_text: I can hope for nothing that is better than that. No one can find anything better for me. I can hope for nothing that is better than that. No one can find anything better for me. I can hope for nothing that is better than that.
korean_text: 나의 희망이 어디 있으며 나의 희망을 누가 보겠느냐

sentences.original_text: I can hope for nothing that is better than that.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것보다 더 좋은 것을 바랄 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: No one can find anything better for me.
sentences.korean_translation: 누구도 나를 위해 더 좋은 것을 찾을 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: I can hope for nothing that is better than that.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것보다 더 좋은 것을 바랄 수 없다.

sentences.korean_translation: 누구도 나를 위해 더 좋은 것을 찾을 수 없다.
